\section*{KENYA MEDICAL TRAINING COLLEGE FACULTY OF INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY AND MEDICAL EDUCATION DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH RECORDS AND INFORMATION \\ FINAL QUALIFYING EXAMINATION FOR DIPLOMA IN HEALTH RECORDS AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY}

PAPER: DATABASE MANAGEMENT (THEORY)

DATE: $18{ }^{\text {th }}$ February 2021
TIME: 3 HOURS (8:00-8:30 A.M)

\section*{INSTRUCTIONS}
1. This paper consists of:
- 30 Multiple Choice Questions
2. Attempt ALL Questions
3. Write the EXAMINATION NUMBER given on all the answer sheets provided and on the question paper.
4. Ensure that all examination answer scripts are handed in at the end of the examination
5. Ensure you sign the examination register provided

\section*{EXAMINATION NUMBER}

\section*{MULTIPLE CHOICE QUESTIONS (30 MARKS)}
1. To start Microsoft PowerPoint application
a) Click on start $\gg$ progress $\gg$ all programs $\gg$ Ms power point
b) Hit ctrl+e then type ppoint.exe and enter
c) Click start >> run then type power point then press enter
d) Hit ctrl+s then type power point
2. PowerPoint presentations are widely used for the following except
a) Note outlines for teachers
b) Project presentations by students
c) Communication of planning
d) Mail set up and postage
3. What PowerPoint feature will one use to apply motion affects to different objects of a slide
a) Slide transition
b) Slide design
c) Animation objects
d) Animation scheme
4. What feature will on use to apply motion effects in between a slide exists and another enters
a) Slide transition
b) Slide design
c) Animation objects
d) Animation scheme
5. In which menu can you find features like slide design and slide layout
a) Insert menu
b) Format menu
c) Tools menu
d) Slide show menu
6. Which shortcut key inserts a new slide in current presentation
a) $\mathrm{Ctrl}+\mathrm{N}$
b) $\mathrm{CtrI}+\mathrm{M}$
c) $\mathrm{CtrI}+\mathrm{S}$
d) $\mathrm{Ctrl}+\mathrm{Z}$
7. What is the best way to create another copy of a slide
a) Click the slide then pres $\mathrm{ctrl}+\mathrm{A}$ and paste in new slide
b) From insert menu choose duplicate slide
c) Redo everything on a new slide that you had done on previous slide
d) On the slide panel click the slide, press etrl+C then hit etrl+Z
8. In a PowerPoint presentation
a) Sound clips can be inserted but not movie clips
b) Movie clips can be inserted but not sound clips
c) Both cannot be inserted
d) Both can be inserted
9. Step by step instructions written to solve any problem is called
a) Pseudocode
b) Algorithm
c) Assembler
d) Class
10. Diagrammatic or symbolic representation of an algorithm is called
a) Data flow diagram
b) E.R diagram
c) Flow chart
d) Algorithm diagram
11. Object oriented programming method is followed in
a) C programming language
b) $\mathrm{C}++$ programming language
c) C\# programming language
d) Both (b) and (c)
12. Informed high level description of an algorithm in English is called
a) Fraction
b) Class
c) Pseudocode
d) Program
13. The geometrical figure $\square$ shown here in a flow chart represents
a) Start/stop
b) Looping
c) Processing
d) Connector
14. This geometrical figure . (circle) in a flow chart represents
a) Connector
b) Alternate process
c) Looping
d) Data
15. In Ms-acess to open new database press
a) $\mathrm{C} t r \mathrm{l}+\mathrm{N}$
b) $\mathrm{Ctrl}+\mathrm{O}$
c) $\mathrm{Ctrl}+\mathrm{Alt}+\mathrm{N}$
d) $\mathrm{Alt}+\mathrm{N}$
16. The checking operation on input data is called the
a) Validation of data
b) Verification of data
c) Cross check
d) Control of data
17. The type of a query that extract data and put them into separate tables is called
a) A parameter query
b) A make-table query
c) An update query
d) A cross tab query
18. What is a firewall in computer network?
a) The physical boundary of network
b) An operating system of computer network
c) A system designed to prevent unauthorized access
d) A web browsing software
19. What is the benefit of computer networking
a) File sharing
b) Easier access to resources
c) Easier backups
d) All of the above
20. Which of the following is not a networking device
a) Gateways
b) Linux
c) Routers
d) Firewalls
21. DHCP server provides .... To the client
a) Protocol
b) IP address
c) MAC address
d) Network address
22. A set of rules that govern all aspects of information communication is called
a) Server
b) Internet
c) Protocol
d) OSI model
23. What is the meaning of bandwidth in network
a) Transmission capacity of a communication channel
b) Connected computers in the network
c) Class of IP used in network
d) Spread of data exchange
24. What does router do in a network
a) Forwards a packet to all outgoing links
b) Forwards a packet to the next outgoing link
c) Determines on which outing link a packet is to be forwarded
d) Forwards a packet to all outgoing links except the originated link
25. Which of the following layer is not a network support layer
a) Transport layer
b) Network layer
c) Data link layer
d) Physical layer
26. Which of the following is not a type of server
a) Proxy server
b) Application server
c) Cloud server
d) Bus server
27. Identify the odd one out of the following terms below
a) Virus
b) Identify theft
c) Hackers
d) Spam
28. Which of the following devices is used to transfer data between LAN
a) Repeater
b) Hub
c) Routers
d) Bridges
29. How many types of IP addresses are there
a) Two
b) Three
c) One
d) Four
30. Which of the following protocol sends electronic mail to the receiver's end
a) FTP
b) SMTP
c) POP 3
d) Both A and B
